Package rekit.logic.gameelements.entities

Class StateEntity

java.lang.Object
rekit.logic.gameelements.GameElement
rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.Entity
rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.StateEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public abstract class StateEntity
extends Entity
This class represents a special kind of Entity, a Entity with inner state. All will be managed by this State.
Author:
Dominik Fuchss
